page.title: 09LANGUAGE.
page.content:
The following are a list of commonly used local words and their meanings.
CASSIE-FACED - a miserable looking person. AWFY PAN LOAF - someone who speaks politely. A HOFF CHOOR - a large stone. A DENSER - a stupid person. A BOGIE - a 4 wheeled go kart made from crates and pram wheels. NOT A SCOOBY - have not got a clue. SKIDGIN - pretending to be sick to stay off school. A PIECE - a sandwich. FIFTY DONK - fifty pence piece. TOATY - small SLICE - square sausage. SCOOSH - lemonade. SWEDGERS - sweets. SNASHTERS - snacks. TOP BOOTS - Wellington Boots.
